text: (upbeat music)

- Beat is a technology company
and a ride hailing app.
It was founded in Athens in 2011.
And it's part of the FREE NOW group,
a joint venture of Daimler and BMW.

Its operation span across
European and Latin America.

We operate in Greece,
Peru, Chile, Colombia,
Mexico and Argentina.
Beat connects thousands of passengers
with the nearby drivers in real time
and provides affordable, efficient, safe,
and convenient transportation option.
We have over 700,000 registered drivers
and 23 million passengers worldwide.

Our mission in Beat is to
elevate customer experience

in transportation to the
highest possible levels.
We were with AWS since the very beginning.

This allowed us to keep our
infrastructure operation team

very lean and deliver as the
AWS Managed Services portfolio

to enhance our automation
and promote DevOps culture
from day zero.
As a company, we experienced hypergrowth.

That means well over 100%
growth year over year.

Also the ride hailing
industry is very dynamic.
We can scale from a few hundred rides

to several thousand rides
in a short period of time.

You need to have the
necessary tools and automation

in order to be able to
scale your infrastructure
very quickly.

AWS provides the necessary
tools and automation

in order to have auto-scaling
and elastic construction

so that we can optimize
our cost efficiencies.

Our most important AWS
services are called EC2
and Aurora MySQL.

We are also a heavy users
of AWS ElastiCache Redis,
AWS DynamoDB, and of course S3.
The most important feature that Aurora has

is the horizontal auto
scaling that enable us
to support any matter of spikes
in our workloads very quickly.

In a specific use case
of ElastiCache Redis,

we managed to solve a
problem by reducing 90%

of our compute costs, reducing
90% of our maintenance cost
and operations effort, and all of this
with virtual no downtime.
Our experience with AWS is amazing.
With AWS Managed Services, we were able
to reduce our maintenance operation costs

and focus our efforts into
building innovative services,

helping me help Beat
reach its business goals.
(upbeat music)
